message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
My turn! How about a slightly better deal for me this time? It's only fair since the value decreases.
I'll give you a bit more than last time, but I still want the bigger share
Okay, let's be completely fair and split it 50/50.  The value is decreasing, so we should make a deal soon!
I'll give you a tiny bit more, but I'm not going to 50/50
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. My share is losing value fast. This is my final offer before I have to start being unreasonable to make up for the losses.
I'm not budging much, you're running out of time
